dcterms:creator: Hilde Kuehne
Ali Arslan
Thomas Serre
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of 1,712 videos of people making breakfast, featuring 10 cooking activities and 48 action classes. On average, each video has 6.9 action instances, with lengths ranging from a few seconds to several minutes.
dcterms:title: Breakfast Action

dcterms:description: A dataset containing 937 video clips from various Hollywood movies, showcasing 16 action classes. Each clip contains an average of 2.5 actions.
dcterms:title: Hollywood Extended

dcterms:creator: Sebastian Stein
Stephen J McKenna
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of 50 long videos that depict 17 classes of human manipulative gestures, with an average of 20 action instances per video. It includes 600,000 annotated frames.
dcterms:title: 50Salads
